Text:
danke fuer die  uploads, 
kannst du  spiegel 3013 3 uploaden?

wenne

Deine Uploads sind immer sehr willkommen. Vielen Dank und eine gutes Jahr 2013.
Swann
Ich schliesse mich den anderen Kommentatoren an. Mach weiter so :-)

Yes, thank you sooo much, papiertiger!!

My (german) mom has a very bad connection. She lives in a village in Asia. Your spiegel edits are invaluable to her. She counts the minutes each week for your edit to appear.

Pleeeeaaase kindly continue with your hard work and enlighten people like her.

We do have a paid account, but this stupid spiegel screws up the page copunt by inserting a useless page, and then the ads...
It's such a disgrace!

It took me an hour to edit the 02/12 for her, so I can relate to your hard work.

Thanks again!!
